location: The moated grange at ST. LUKE's.

lines.text: Enter MARIANA and a Boy
Boy sings

lines.speaker: mariana
lines.text: Break off thy song, and haste thee quick away: Here comes a man of comfort, whose advice Hath often still'd my brawling discontent. I cry you mercy, sir; and well could wish You had not found me here so musical: Let me excuse me, and believe me so, My mirth it much displeased, but pleased my woe.
Exit Boy
Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before

lines.speaker: duke vincentio
lines.text: 'Tis good; though music oft hath such a charm To make bad good, and good provoke to harm. I pray, you, tell me, hath any body inquired for me here to-day? much upon this time have I promised here to meet.

lines.speaker: mariana
lines.text: You have not been inquired after: I have sat here all day.
Enter ISABELLA

lines.speaker: duke vincentio
lines.text: I do constantly believe you. The time is come even now. I shall crave your forbearance a little: may be I will call upon you anon, for some advantage to yourself.

lines.speaker: mariana
lines.text: I am always bound to you.
Exit

lines.speaker: duke vincentio
lines.text: Very well met, and well come. What is the news from this good deputy?

lines.speaker: isabella
lines.text: He hath a garden circummured with brick, Whose western side is with a vineyard back'd; And to that vineyard is a planched gate, That makes his opening with this bigger key: This other doth command a little door Which from the vineyard to the garden leads; There have I made my promise Upon the heavy middle of the night To call upon him.

lines.speaker: duke vincentio
lines.text: But shall you on your knowledge find this way?

lines.speaker: isabella
lines.text: I have ta'en a due and wary note upon't: With whispering and most guilty diligence, In action all of precept, he did show me The way twice o'er.

lines.speaker: duke vincentio
lines.text: Are there no other tokens Between you 'greed concerning her observance?

lines.speaker: isabella
lines.text: No, none, but only a repair i' the dark; And that I have possess'd him my most stay Can be but brief; for I have made him know I have a servant comes with me along, That stays upon me, whose persuasion is I come about my brother.

lines.speaker: duke vincentio
lines.text: 'Tis well borne up. I have not yet made known to Mariana A word of this. What, ho! within! come forth! I pray you, be acquainted with this maid; She comes to do you good.
Re-enter MARIANA

lines.speaker: isabella
lines.text: I do desire the like.

lines.speaker: duke vincentio
lines.text: Do you persuade yourself that I respect you?

lines.speaker: mariana
lines.text: Good friar, I know you do, and have found it.

lines.speaker: duke vincentio
lines.text: Take, then, this your companion by the hand, Who hath a story ready for your ear. I shall attend your leisure: but make haste; The vaporous night approaches.

lines.speaker: mariana
lines.text: Will't please you walk aside?
Exeunt MARIANA and ISABELLA

lines.speaker: duke vincentio
lines.text: O place and greatness! millions of false eyes Are stuck upon thee: volumes of report Run with these false and most contrarious quests Upon thy doings: thousand escapes of wit Make thee the father of their idle dreams And rack thee in their fancies. Welcome, how agreed?
Re-enter MARIANA and ISABELLA

lines.speaker: isabella
lines.text: She'll take the enterprise upon her, father, If you advise it.

lines.speaker: duke vincentio
lines.text: It is not my consent, But my entreaty too.

lines.speaker: isabella
lines.text: Little have you to say When you depart from him, but, soft and low, 'Remember now my brother.'

lines.speaker: mariana
lines.text: Fear me not.

lines.speaker: duke vincentio
lines.text: Nor, gentle daughter, fear you not at all. He is your husband on a pre-contract: To bring you thus together, 'tis no sin, Sith that the justice of your title to him Doth flourish the deceit. Come, let us go: Our corn's to reap, for yet our tithe's to sow.
Exeunt
